}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|Arris NVG595|Arris NVG599|Arris NVG448B}}
*''[https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/PGR-NVG5XDBAX/4648303 Product Summary]'': The NVG5X8AX module is a cost effective PCIe 2.4/5GHz 802.11ax :WiFi module designed to be incorporated in to ARRIS NVG5x8 product line on behalf of :or by ARRIS, and is not for sale or dis tributionas a standalone module. *This module incorporates two [[Broadcom]] BCM43684 SoC 4x4 designs which is capable of :supporting 802.11a/b/g/n/ac/ax modes. The modules utilises [[Skyworks]] SKY85331-11 & :SKY85743-21 Low Noise Amplifiers and is designed for use in USA and Canada.
;Variants: * NVG578: XG-PON Asymmetrical 10/2.5 – Tri-band or Dual-band Wi-Fi * NVG578S: XGS-PON Symmetrical 10/10 – Tri-band or Dual-band Wi-Fi * NVG578L(LX): 2.5GPON – Tri-band or Dual-band Wi-Fi
:Product literature makes it sound like this device is optionally dual-band or :tri-band for all three variants. 802.11ax support may be optional as well.
*Link speed: 2.5G/10G (2488/9953 Mbps)
==See also== *[[Salt Fiber Box]] • BCM68580 (ARM), BCM4366E, BCM84881 *[[Sagemcom F@ST 5650]] • BCM68500 (ARM), BCM43217
===Models=== :;[[Arris]] *[[Arris NVG548]] • BCM63158 (ARM), BCM43684 (AX)/BCM4366E (AC) *[[Arris NVG558]] • BCM63159 (ARM)/BCM62118, BCM43684 (AX)/BCM4366E (AC) *[[Arris NVG578]] • BCM68580 (ARM), BCM43684 (AX)/BCM4366E (AC) <!-- :;[[Broadcom]] SoC *BCM62118 (ARM), BCM68580 (ARM) *BCM63138 (MIPS), BCM63148 (MIPS) *BCM63158 (ARM), BCM63168 (MIPS) *BCM6361, BCM6368, BCM63281, BCM6819 *Wireless: BCM43684, BCM4366, BCM43602 *LAN: BCM53125, BCM53134, BCM84880 (10G) -->
